meanings.definition: The state or quality of being uncommon.
meanings.sent1: The uncommonness of her talent amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The uncommonness of snow in summer surprised the children.
meanings.sent3: The party had an uncommonness of guests wearing pajamas.
meanings.sent4: His uncommonness in a sea of mediocrity shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The unicorn's uncommonness made it the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: The lack of commonness or frequency.
meanings.sent1: The uncommonness of sightings made the creature mysterious.
meanings.sent2: The uncommonness of his visits raised suspicions.
meanings.sent3: The uncommonness of the event left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The uncommonness of her laughter echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The uncommonness of shooting stars always brought joy to her heart.
